name: A jumpy adventure
description:
A little game where i tried to replicate Jump king mechanic and add another one. In the end it would be better to polish core mechanic and remove moving platforms.

Controls: 

  • A/D - moving left and right.
  • Space - hold it to charge jump. You will see an animation if jump is fully charged. Release with control button pressed to jump left or right.

Also i tried to draw in details all 5 screens, but I gave up after the se cond one. It was too hard for me to spend more than one hour on every scene :P
